title: Expedited Review
body: There should be a form developers can fill out to request expedited review. Apple has such a form, and on the few occasions that I've needed to use it, they've generally completed a review in a few hours. This is useful for situations where a critical security flaw is identified, or where a trade show or other immovable deadline requires an app get through the review process more quickly than usual.

comments.body: This would be great!  We are in situation like this right now.  We had a bad update that is crashing for most customers.  We have a fix and this certification is now suddenly taking longer than most when we need it to be the fastest.
